channel.title: Posts on Eric
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Eric

item.title: Ionic 2 Timeout Http
item.description: should add this : import 'rxjs/add/operator/timeout' this.http.post('myUrl', MyData, {headers: Myheaders}) .timeout(3000, new Error('timeout exceeded')) .map(res => res.json()) .subscribe( data => this.ret = data, error => console.debug('ERROR', error), () => console.log('END') ); then it can work.

item.title: Ionic Input Bug 1 - need to put the input in ion-list>ion-item
item.description: <ion-grid> <ion-row> </ion-col> <ion-item> <ion-label color="black" >test1</ion-label> <ion-input type="number" text-right placeholder="0" name="a" [(ngModel)]="data.a" pattern="\d*"> </ion-input> </ion-item> </ion-item> </ion-col> </ion-row> <ion-row> <ion-col> <ion-item> <ion-label color="black" >can't go this input in ios</ion-label> <ion-input type="number" text-right placeholder="0" name="b" [(ngModel)]="data.b" pattern="\d*"> </ion-input> </ion-item> </ion-item> </ion-col> </ion-row> </ion-grid> 在这样的结构中， ion-input 无法被点击，跳转到下一个input输入点。除非是键盘按 next 才可以。 之后改为： <ion-list> <ion-item> <ion-label color="black" >test1</ion-label> <ion-input type="number" text-right placeholder="0" name="a" [(ngModel)]="data.a" pattern="\d*"> </ion-input> </ion-item> </ion-item> <ion-item> <ion-label color="black" >can't go this input in ios</ion-label> <ion-input type="number" text-right placeholder="0" name="b" [(ngModel)]="data.
